{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC Southern Queensland| |callsign = 4QS| |coordinates = {{Coord|27|33|36.67|S|151|56|54.06|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 17 October 1939| |frequency = 747 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Darling Downs
104.9 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Southern Downs| |area = [[Darling Downs, Queensland|Darling Downs]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]]| |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/southqld/ http://www.abc.net.au/southqld/]| }} '''ABC Southern Queensland''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Toowoomba, Queensland|Toowoomba]] broadcasting to the [[Darling Downs, Queensland|Darling Downs]] region of [[Queensland]]. This includes the towns of [[Warwick, Queensland|Warwick]], [[Dalby, Queensland|Dalby]], [[Kingaroy, Queensland|Kingaroy]] and [[Goondiwindi, Queensland|Goondiwindi]]. The station began broadcasting as '''4QS''' in 1939. As well as a number of low power FM transmitters, the station broadcasts through the following main [[FM Broadcasting|FM]] and [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] transmitters: *'''4QS''' 747 AM *'''4QS/T''' 104.9 FM ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *Breakfast with David Iliffe â 5:00 AM to 8:00 AM *Mornings with Belinda Sanders â 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM *Drive with Craig Zonca - 4pm to 6pm (state wide but broadcast from the SQ Station) ===Saturday=== *Saturday Breakfast with Dennis OâHara â 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[ABC Capricornia]] and [[612 ABC Brisbane]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=The origins of ABC Southern Queensland |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/02/29/2176261.htm|date=2008-02-29 |accessdate=2008-05-07 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} {{Toowoomba Radio}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc Southern Queensland}} [[Category:Radio stations in Queensland]]
